name: Hazard Life
description:
A game of speed on your fingers where you will find a SUBJECT strapped against the wall in a dark room!

Where there are air pumps filled with RADIOACTIVE LIQUID, the Pumps will fill and the LIQUID will be spread throughout the room, which will immediately kill the subject.

And it will all be your fault!

To avoid that you will have to CLICK with the mouse on the left button, quickly (anywhere on the screen), in order to make the RADIOACTIVE LIQUID bar go down to ZERO and thus the SUBJECT does not die...

Attributions:

The Truth by Jake Parker
